Love this top it is good for spring or fall

It’s so comfy and flattering! Even my super cool teenage cousin complimented me on it! The length is in-between a stomach revealing crop and a normal length shirt, so it works for a great French tuck without a ton of bulk.

The way this sweater fits is not as pictured. It is more of a traditional sweater vest fit than a slouchy shoulder fit. I do still wear it, but have to put a tshirt or long sleeve underneath to style. The fabric has a pretty good thickness to it, and is definitely not thin/cheap looking. If you like the color scheme and pattern I would recommend this, but don’t expect it to fit like the pictures.

评论概述: Cute but not quite the right fit
评论详情: This item was really cute and reflected the picture well in terms of colors. The material was a bit thin but not too bad. My only complaint really was that the sleeves are much shorter in real life than in the picture, it's more like a really thick tank top than sleeves.
Super cute and got several compliments. Definitely get what you paid for.

I’m 5’9” and 145. And got the medium. The top isn’t so cropped that it shows my belly other than when I raise my arms up but it’s also too short to do the little front tuck! It isn’t see through and the sleeves don’t have a big gap under the arm so it doesn’t show your bra. I love it and want every color!!
very comfy and received lots of compliments
cute and comfy and very stylish!!!

This is a really comfortable and cute top. If you are on the fence, just buy it.
I love these colors and the material! Im 5’9 and have a pretty long torso, so It is fairly short, but fits great with some high rise jeans or shorts!

It’s a great shirt! I’m very happy with it.

I was a little nervous to order this top because it looked a little too short in some of the reviews however it fits exactly as I would have hoped. I normally wear a women’s medium and that is the size I ordered.

This has been a perfect top to wear while I eagerly wait for fall weather.  It's a nice weight, not too heavy but still cozy. I feel super comfortable while looking cute.  I spotted my SIL wearing it and had to get one for myself. So glad I did -  great price and purchase.

评论概述: Saodimallsu Womens Cap Sleeve Crop Tops
评论详情: Purchased this in khaki, green, red, light green, and purple yellow. The green and red sweaters look exactly like the picture and are vibrant colors. Loved them! The khaki was mostly brown but I didnt like the color of the brown so Im returning it. The light green and purple/yellow were too similar and the color was kind out washed out. Im returning those as well. I didnt find that it was too short. I think I would have kept the khaki if the trim had been brown instead of creme/off white. Overall, the sweaters are nice just not the color tone I preferred.
Very cute & very true to size.
I like the colors on this, though I felt like they weren't quite as vibrant in person.  The fit was just a little too boxy for me so I returned it.

Quality material. Fits like a charm, I ordered a small. It’s soft and the material is most definitely not cheap. It washes great too. The colors didn’t bleed. I purchased for an oversized look, but it has stretching ability. Looks great with light wash jeans and shorts.
I love this shirt. It’s great quality, soft, and comfy to wear. It does shrink in the wash which was disappointing because it hasn’t ever fit the same :(
Love this sweater. I get so many compliments.

Super cute, you can wear this with shorts, jeans you name it.

A great sweater for any weather. Colors were as pictured and I get compliments every time I wear it.
I got so many compliments on this, and even though it is a sweater it is not too hot to wear in the summer., Love it so much I might buy another!

Love this sweater! I'm a 36C, 135lbs, short waisted. Usually wear a small or medium. I bought the medium and it fits great. Not too cropped. I put it in the dryer for only a few minutes then put on a hanger to dry fully. Did not shrink or draw up. The quality is great. This is my 2nd sweater from Saodimallsu. Very pleased.

评论概述: High quality, looks just like the picture
评论详情: The colors are vibrant and look exactly as they're pictured. The material is great quality, and does not feel cheap in any way. I think this sweater is super flattering and unlike anything else I own which is why I bought it, and it has quickly become a fun closet staple to wear to my middle school classroom as a teacher. The kids love it and think it 'slays'. I have washed and dried it with no issue or shrinkage. I would say the cut is more boxy and it's a little bit shorter than full length...like hits my belly button maybe which is perfect for wearing with high waisted paints or even just pants that don't sit low on the hips. I would purchase it again!

This top is super soft and comfortable and not too hot to wear! I was worried about the size and length. I’m 5’7 190lbs and ordered an XL. The length is perfect for me!

I agree with some on sizing up for a looser fit like the model. This is a very soft material and great quality. It is a sweater like material, but soft.
